New Records: Sri Lanka registered their first win in the tournament
Netherlands scored 262 runs with Sybrand Engelbrecht (70) and Logan van Beek (59) as top scorers
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka chased down the target with 10 balls remaining
Key wickets fell on both sides including Pathum Nissanka, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Charith Asalanka for Sri Lanka and Vikramjit Singh, Colin Ackermann for Netherlands
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands won the toss and decided to bat first
Historical context of past matches between Netherlands and Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's first win boosted their morale ahead of the World Cup
Netherlands need to improve their performance in upcoming matches
